projects.title: Ecommerce
projects.desc: A store front that sells designer items to consumers. You can go through the entire payment process and add a credit card to pay for the products, the payment is then sent to Stripe.

projects.title: Buoy Tracker
projects.desc: A site made for a customer wanting to keep track of the buoys in the current lakes. Google Maps API and adding a login system to keep track of users favorite buoys.
